contentList.content: Trader gold will be reduced to a fourth of the original value.
Would you like to open the Full Loot Settings Menu?
Enable More Difficult Traders - Traders will be considerably tougher when when pulled into combat with a player.
Traders will have bodyguards spawn to protect them.
Enable Looting Equipped Armor - Note that this may make NPCs suddenly naked when they die, and many NPCs don't actually have equippable armor.
[Debug] Most NPCs don't actually have any equippable armor, so this won't do much.
[Debug] Uncheck to trigger setup again when the scripts check for this flag.

Activate [Experimental Mode]? Warning: Equipped weapons & armor on NPCs aren't always meant to be lootable, or even equippable by players. You may see weird stuff when looting certain kinds of NPCs. Additionally, NPCs will become naked when they die, as their equipment is removed and added to their corpse.
Balance Trader Gold (1/2) - Gold dropped from traders will be 1/2 of what it used to be.

Full Loot has been activated. Please select a difficulty mode.
(Advanced Users: Spam 1 to use the default settings).

*Activate [Hard Mode]. Trader gold is reduced to 1/4 of its original value when dropped, traders become stronger when a player tries to kill them, and traders summon bodyguards when attacked by players.*
Balance Trader Gold (1/4) - Gold dropped from traders will be 1/4 of what it used to be.
*Activate [Balanced Mode]. Trader gold is reduced to 1/4 of its original value when dropped. Traders will not have bodyguards, but become stronger when attacked by players.*
Disable More Difficult Traders - Traders will become the loot-filled, wet paper bags they used to be.
Disable Full Loot - Killed enemies will no longer drop their full amount of loot.
Looted trader gold will be modified to be less than the original amount, for balance.
[Debug] Most NPCs don't actually have any equippable weapons, so this won't do much.
Trader gold will be reduced to half of the original value.

Makes all characters fully lootable (including trade items), with optional settings to enable looting armor, weapons, and rebalancing gold dropped from traders. Additionally, full loot can be enabled for PVP.
Activate [Easy Mode]. Trader gold is untouched when it drops, trader strength is untouched, and traders have no bodyguards.*

*Activate [Experimental Mode]. Trader gold is reduced to 1/4 of its original value when dropped, traders become stronger when a player tries to kill them, traders summon bodyguards when attacked by players, PVP looting is enabled (players of opposing parties can loot one another when killed by a player), and equipped weapons & armor are lootable.

Enable Full PVP Loot - This will make player equipment and items lootable like NPCs when they die from players in a different party. Note that the cause of death has to be another player - Death from surfaces may not pass the proper cause along.
Traders will be a bit tougher to protect their precious loot!
Enable Looting Equipped Weapons - Note that many non-humanoid NPCs don't have normal, equippable weapons, so they may have a "Warning" icon (yellow triangle with an exclamation point).
Enable Full Loot - Killed enemies will drop their full amount of loot.
Trader is more difficult after being attacked by the party.
*Cancel and go back to mode selection.*
Enable Trader Guards - When pulled into combat with a player, bodyguards will appear to defend the trader.
